name: European Consortium of the Organic-based Fertilizer Industry
goal: ECOFI represents the European producers of Organic Fertilizers, Organo-Mineral Fertilizers and Organic Soil Improvers. It provides a forum for members to discuss common issues and to forge consensus at the European level on key technical and political issues facing the sector.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Environment, Food Safety, Research and innovation, Single market
euInitiatives:
* Circular Economy
* Bioeconomy
* Europe 2020
* Horizon 2020
* Revision of the fertilizer regulation
* Agricultural policy, including organic production
* Animal by-product regulation
* End-of-waste and related issues
